Class Company

  • java.lang.Object
    • Company

  • public class Company
extends java.lang.Object
    Company controller class which handles all operations of the company as managing Employees, Customers, Branches, Shipments etc.
    Since:
    2020-02-25
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Berke Belgin
